Project: bun-ready
Type: CLI tool (TypeScript) to estimate Bun migration risk.

Core commands:
- bun-ready scan <path> [--format md|json] [--out <file>] [--no-install] [--no-test]

Key behaviors:
- Reads package.json/lockfiles/scripts
- Optional bun install --dry-run in a temp directory
- Optional bun test when Bun-compatible
- Produces deterministic report (Markdown/JSON)
- Exit codes: 0 green, 2 yellow, 3 red

Constraints:
- No modifying user repos
- Tests must not hit network
- Keep dependencies minimal (prefer none)
